title: How do I import contacts from or export contacts to a SIM card?
answer:
Importing contacts from a SIM card 

 Go to Contacts. Touch the menu key then Import/export. From the displayed screen, touch Import from sim (in this example, only one SIM card is inserted). Select the contacts you want to import, and touch IMPORT. From the displayed option menu, touch Phone. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112749) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112750) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112751) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112752)

 Exporting contacts to a SIM card 

 Go to Contacts. Touch the menu key then Import/export. From the displayed screen, touch Export to sim (in this example, only one SIM card is inserted). Select the contacts you want to export, and touch EXPORT. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112753) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112754) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112755)
